The first version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''December 23, 2009''' at 00:40 UTC.<ref name=":0">[[wordofnotch:295879830|Oh, ok! Here, play with a version!]] – The Word of Notch, December 23, 2009</ref><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P6:40:14 <�08Notch�> http://www.minecraft.net/indev/''" (00:40 UTC)</ref>

This is the first version of the [[Java Edition Indev|Indev]] development cycle of ''Minecraft'', and the first paid version of ''Minecraft'' (available at €9.95), as Notch released this version for paid users to test out new features.<ref name=":0"/>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Light]]ing'''
* Added dynamic lighting.
* There are 9 different light levels.
** Due to this, caves have now been made darker.
* [[Block]]s in the [[inventory]] and [[hotbar]] are affected by lighting - upon generating a new world they appear dark, then go back to normal brightness after a while.
* Shadows appear below mobs.
* Changed shading on the sides of blocks.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Bedrock JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bedrock]]'''
* Added to the last layer of the world again.
* Hardness now equals 999.

'''[[File:Brown Mushroom JE2.png|32px]] [[Brown Mushroom]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Brown Mushroom JE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Dandelion JE2.png|32px]] [[Dandelion]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Dandelion JE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Red Mushroom JE2.png|32px]] [[Red Mushroom]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Red Mushroom JE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Rose JE2.png|32px]] [[Rose]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Rose JE1.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Oak Sapling JE3.png|32px]] [[Sapling]] '''
* Changed the texture from [[File:Oak Sapling JE2.png|32px]].

'''[[File:TNT JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[TNT]]'''
* Placing a [[TNT]] block, and then destroying it, causes the layer below to turn to wood, but only blocks made of the same material get replaced.<ref>[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LmnESwvfIRk Minecraft 0.31 Plank Glitch]</ref> This was used by Notch to debug flooding.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P6:58:46 <�08Notch�> if you place tnt above ground and destroy it you can make roofs very fast''" (00:58 UTC)</ref>

'''[[File:Water JE6.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Water JE4.png|32px]].

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Rana.png|32px]] [[Mob (entity)|Mob]]'''
* Uses a new model and texture, known as "Rana".
* Can now spawn again.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Game mode]]s'''
* This version is in [[Creative]] mode.
* TNT was removed from hotbar.

'''[[Survival]] mode'''
* As a side effect of the entity removal, blocks no longer drop [[item]]s when mined and attempting to fire arrows doesn't do anything.
* The player only has one bubble of [[air]] bubble when breathing underwater, down from 10.
* [[File:Dandelion (item) JE1.png|16px]] Flowers in the build screen are now shown with both sprites crossed.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P6:48:18 <Iguana> Plants and such look very squished in the inventory. :P''" (00:48 UTC)</ref>
** These changes can only be found by modding as the game runs in Creative by default.
* The player now spawns with 99 stone slabs, stone, [[water]] blocks and [[lava]] blocks.
** These changes can only be found by modding as the game runs in Creative by default.

=== General ===
* New work-in-progress level format.
** Level saving/loading no longer works.
* Rain now goes through glass.
* The world is now generated as a small size by default.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P6:57:25 <�08Notch�> oh yeah, I made it default to small while I was developing for quicker map regeneration times. =)''" (00:57 UTC)</ref>
* Grass block no longer spreads.
* Leaf particles fall at the normal speed again.{{verify|edition=java|type=change}}
* The size of the .jar file has been changed to 1765K instead of 285K because of 4 new .md3 files. <ref>[[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20091223-0040/Development]]</ref>

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Now partially inaccessible (although the multiplayer code still exists and can be re-enabled). 
** Connecting to a multiplayer server causes players to spawn in a [[bedrock]] cube.{{citation needed}}
** The game acts as if it is in singleplayer – [[chat]] is inaccessible and the player list cannot be opened.

'''[[Music]]'''
* No longer plays.

'''[[Survival]] mode{{verify|type=untestable|edition=java|Could be in-1223-2}}'''
* Can be enabled via modding.

'''[[Sound]]'''
* No longer plays.

== Bugs ==
'''4 bugs reported'''
* Generating new world in a huge size sometimes causes a lot of Rana to spawn close to the player, sometimes resulting in the game freezing.
* Placing a block on a slab causes the space between to be completely dark.
* The top of the map is completely dark.
* Block breaking particles are pitch black.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P6:45:39 <Snowman> Block breaking particles are pitch black''" (00:45 UTC)</ref>
